projectGridLines.title: Product and Growth Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This is a generalist role, suitable for people who strive for excellence

in outcomes and have open-ended interests across Product and Growth verticals.

You’ll work closely with the early founding team of MarianaAI, to help us scale

through the 1-10 leg of our journey, as we build some of India’s most technically

innovative AI models to empower Healthcare around the world starting with the US.

Skill sets: Copywriting, Data Analysis, Content Writing

Traits expectation: Fast learning curve, Creative, Street-Smart, Perfectionist

Expected learning: To optimize for organizational growth in an early-stage startup

combining levers across Product, Marketing, and Sales verticals.

Specific courses required for project execution: CSE, EEE, ENI, Mech
